official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the disclosure to State and local law enforcement agencies of the identity of individuals claiming tax benefits improperly using Social Security numbers of other individuals.

summary.text: ID Theft Loophole Closure Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the disclosure to State and local enforcement agencies of the identity of individuals claiming a tax benefit using improper social security numbers.
